overview: The film should look not only every fan of the battles, but everyone who wants to understand this culture, learn about its history and about where it is moving. Cast: Slava KPSS, Noize MC, Khayd, Khovansky, Garry Topor, PLC, SD, Zamay, Booker, Pokhoronil, Teeraps, Piem, Seimur, vs94ski, Ernesto, KHKHOS, Kingsta, Gabonych and many others (even  Tina Kandelaki!).
title: Battle
